DrugName: Estrogen creams or vaginal estrogen tablets for symptomatic uterine prolapse
Pain relief medications such as ibuprofen or acetaminophen to manage discomfort and pain associated with uterine prolapse
Muscle relaxants like cyclobenzaprine or methocarbamol to alleviate muscle spasms and pain in fibromyalgia
Selective estrogen receptor modulators (SERMs) such as tamoxifen or raloxifene for breast cancer treatment
Hormone replacement therapy (HRT) or vaginal estriol creams for menopausal symptoms
Antihypertensives like amlodipine or metformin to manage hypertension and glucose intolerance
